channel.title: Capitalism - the Game
channel.description: Recent content on Capitalism - the Game

item.title: Bars
item.description: The bar or ‘doughnut’ icon lets you choose what to do. (The last option is incomplete). They are listed below: Dashboard # This is where you create and manage games or ‘simulations’. It displays any games you created so far, and a list of games you can play. The plan is that you will be able to create games and share them with other users. At present, there’s just a fixed list.
